welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Port Washington! Known for its charming waterfront and rich history, we invite you to explore the city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines such as JetBlue, Southwest, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Domestic flights for Delta Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: International flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Domestic flights for JetBlue Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate aircraft, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Limited free access, additional options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a small terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
